title: Momentary
description: The momentary switch assignment essentially just acts like a normal button

threshold.description: The threshold which the gamepad control needs to exceed before triggering the action. For most momentary implementations this can be any value since most buttons report a value of 0 or 1

action_activate.description: The actual action to activate when the threshold is exceeded

action_deactivate.description: The action to activate when the threshold is not exceeded anymore. This defaults to just releasing the previously activated key(s).
